name: You'll Never Shine If You Don't Glow
name_original: You'll Never Shine If You Don't Glow
description:
This game is the result of a one week game Jam made with a team of 4 Game Design students.

Manaut 'Adament' Berton-Boitel (Game Design & Code)

Alexandre "Aeron" Kaustic (Game Design & Code)

Justine "Nichouel" Lebervet (Game Design & Level Design)

Anthony " Elkiah" Danis (Game Design & Art & Sound Design)
